title: Display — Reason & emotion
content:
Hello,  
wondering what this font is called?  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065334im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_mrwfkasSEL1qzqavpo1_1280_5267.jpg)

Font: 

 FB Big Caslon 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065334/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: Emma-L

comments.content: Looks like Caslon to me and I'd probably go with [FB Big Caslon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065334/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/big-caslon) by Matthew Carter, the most contrasted version I know.
